name: Fear The Light
description:
Inspired by Watership Down and Plague Dogs, 'Fear the Light' is a minimalistic story of two rabbits, told in the form of a post-arcade stealth experience.

Created for the 2016 LOWREZJAM, it was created using Love2d and Photoshop.

Also, thank you everyone for the feedback from the jam, it is much appreciated and will be used as critical points in upcoming projects :D

p.s. Dont forget to have your sound on :D

Controls:

Move - Arrow Keys
Sleep - Z

Created by:

  • Jeremy Craig ( Code / Art / Story )
  • Tristan Whitfield ( Music )
